sub_module.name: general
sub_module.doc: General parameters of Egress Shared Buffers

feature.name: esb_support
feature.doc: Indication if Egress Shared Buffers are supported for device

define.name: total_nof_esb_queues
define.doc: Number of ESB queue IDs, each queue represents an interface (NIFs or special)

define.name: nof_nif_eth_queues
define.doc: Number of ESB queue IDs that represent NIF ETH interfaces

define.name: nof_nif_ilkn_queues
define.doc: Number of ESB queue IDs that represent NIF ILKN interfaces

define.name: nof_ilkn_tdm_queues
define.doc: Number of ESB queue IDs dedicated for ILKN TDM interleave

define.name: nof_flexe_queues
define.doc: Number of ESB queue IDs that represent FlexE interfaces

define.name: nof_special_queues
define.doc: Number of ESB queue IDs that represent special interfaces

define.name: nof_reserved_queues
define.doc: Number of ESB queue IDs that are reserved(not used)

define.name: mux_cal_len
define.doc: Calendar length for the ESB MUX calendar

define.name: ilkn_credits_resolution
define.doc: number of credits to add for each speed resolution

define.name: ilkn_credits_rate_resolution
define.doc: ilkn rate resolution (units: Mbps), for calculate the number of credits

define.name: nof_buffers_per_fpc
define.doc: Number of buffers per Free Pointer Controller

value.name: interleave_queue_id
value.doc: Dedicated ESB queue ID for interleave

value.name: min_gap
value.doc: Value of min gap for MUX access

numeric.name: txi_irdy_th_factor
numeric.doc: Value of a per-device parameter used to calculate the IRDY threshold

numeric.name: slow_port_dedicated_queue
numeric.doc: Dedicated ESB queue ID for Slow Ports (under 10G) to be used in the MUX calendar

numeric.name: flexe_l1_dest_dedicated_queue
numeric.doc: Dedicated ESB queue ID for FlexE L1 destination ports to be used in the MUX calendar

define.name: pm_internal_port_size
define.doc: Size in bits of the port number internal to the port macro field in table for ESB queue to EGQ interface mapping
